# File lib/json/pure/generator.rb, line 158
158:           def to_json(state = nil, depth = 0, *)
159:             if state
160:               state = JSON.state.from_state(state)
161:               json_check_circular(state) { json_transform(state, depth) }
162:             else
163:               json_transform(state, depth)
164:             end
165:           end
